name: AIG-Orion
overview: Investing only in Internet and Information Technologies companies at various developmental stages, they carefully consider and select only those companies for whom they know their technological, marketing and management proficiency will provide a strategic synergy that brings added value. Their preferred initial investment range falls between $2-5 million. Futhermore, it is their fundamental belief that a company's ultimate success depends largely upon the founders and supporting team. Therefore, they do not take a controlling interest in companies, rather, they believe the equity interest of the founders and employees must serve as the main incentive for them to assume primary responsibility for daily management and for the company’s long-term success. Â© AIG Orion
